definition: car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)
to stop/to pause/to arrange/to lay out/to kowtow/to stamp (one's foot)/at once/classifier for meals, beatings, scoldings etc: time, bout, spell, meal

sentences.english: He returned from the trip and he must be very tired.
sentences.chinese: 他旅遊回來了，一定是舟車勞頓。

sentences.english: Hope you are not so tired after such a tougher journey!
sentences.chinese: 今天很失敗，敗在“舟車勞頓，一路辛苦”。

sentences.english: In addition long-term Fatigue of travel, extremely easy to have the acute metabolic disorder complication.
sentences.chinese: 加上長期舟車勞頓，極容易發生急性代謝紊亂併發症。

definition: fears of trouble in the rear (idiom); family worries (obstructing freedom of action)/worries about the future consequences/often in negative expressions, meaning "no worries about anything"
to leave one's homeplace (to find work, flee disaster etc)
to be clogged up/to be congested (traffic, computer network etc)
unable to move freely/difficult to get about
to whine on for days (idiom)/to endlessly grumble complaints/incessant whining
scorched and drenched by sun and rain (idiom); suffer from exposure to the elements/weather-beaten
a hot tourist attraction/a tourist trap
taking everyone along, young and old/to look after the elderly and the young
